casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

June 15, 2006

[Cite as 06/15/2006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-2997.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2005-0150. Lewis v. J. E. Wiggins & Co.

Franklin App. No. 04AP-469, 04AP-544, and 04AP-668, 2004-Ohio-6724. This cause came on for further consideration of appellant’s motion for leave to file a motion to vacate judgment for attorney-fees and the motion to vacate judgment for attorney fees. Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that that the motions are denied.
